events.message: The candidate has submitted their application for the software engineer position in our backend team.
Based on the resume and cover letter, the application has been categorised under the Engineering cluster.
A recruiter specializing in software development roles has been assigned to handle this candidate.
The initial phone screening for the software engineer applicant was completed successfully with positive feedback.
The candidate responded promptly, confirming availability for the technical interview and expressing strong interest.
The technical interview has been scheduled for next week to assess the candidateâ€™s engineering and coding skills.
The candidate successfully completed the technical interview, demonstrating strong knowledge in software development principles.
An HR interview has been scheduled to discuss company culture fit and benefits with the engineering candidate.
The HR interview concluded positively with good alignment on values and expectations for the engineering role.
An offer has been proposed to the candidate, outlining the compensation package and role details for the engineering position.
The candidate responded with positive feedback and acceptance of the terms included in the offer letter.
The candidate formally accepted the offer to join as a software engineer, and onboarding preparations have begun.
The onboarding process has been initiated for the new software engineer, including access setups and orientation scheduling.
The recruitment process is now complete with the successful hire of the software engineer starting in the backend team.
